A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointed - new characters are invincible whilst all others bite the dust or are simply cannon fodder (once maybe\, but again and again??). Luke and Snoke endings are appalling. Story line awful. Disney really dropped the ball on this one. Grew up with Star Wars in the '70s and quite liked Force Awakens but this is the last one I'll bother going to watch. But....strangely\, wife and kids quite liked it!
